attributes.action: Make dog owners criminally responsible for their dogs actions/behaviour
attributes.additional_details:
To help to make dog owners aware that thier dogs actions/behaviour will have repercussions for them too

Thus hopefully making owners more responsible for their dogs actions/behaviour
attributes.background: Make it so that all dog owners (regardless of breed) are criminally responsible for their dogs actions, e.g if a dog bites someone or another dog, the owner is charged with ABH/GBH or if the dog kills someone or another dog the owner is charged with murder and possession of a dangerous weapon

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Make dogs attacking other pets a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637398
